findings.issue: Missing AuthProvider in CLAUDE.md provider hierarchy
findings.description: The provider hierarchy documentation does not mention AuthProvider, but it exists in the code.
findings.actual: Provider hierarchy includes: Redux, QueryClient, BrowserRouter, ThemeProvider, CssBaseline, AuthProvider
findings.documented: Provider hierarchy lists: Redux, QueryClient, BrowserRouter, ThemeProvider, CssBaseline (missing AuthProvider)
findings.recommendation: Add AuthProvider to the provider hierarchy list in CLAUDE.md around line 52

findings.description: Documentation lists 0 routes but codebase has 10 routes.
findings.actual: 10 routes: Home, About, Login, Signup, VerifyCode, Dashboard, OpenRouterComponent, LeetMaster, Logs, Account
findings.recommendation: Update line 54 to include all routes: Home, About, Login, Signup, VerifyCode, Dashboard, OpenRouterComponent, LeetMaster, Logs, Account

findings.issue: Technology stack not fully documented in README.md
findings.description: Some major dependencies are not mentioned in the README tech stack section.
findings.actual: Technologies in use: Material-UI (MUI), React Router

findings.issue: README.md missing npm scripts from CLAUDE.md
findings.description: Some npm commands documented in CLAUDE.md are not in README.md.
findings.recommendation: Add command documentation to README.md: serve

findings.issue: README.md missing environment variables from CLAUDE.md
findings.description: Some environment variables in CLAUDE.md are not documented in README.md.
